summary: A young hoodlum rises up through the ranks of the Chicago underworld, even as a gangster's accidental death threatens to spark a bloody mob war.
cast: James Cagney|Jean Harlow|Edward Woods|Joan Blondell|Donald Cook|Leslie Fenton|Beryl Mercer|Robert Emmett O'Connor|Murray Kinnell|Lev Abramov|Clark Burroughs|Mae Clarke|Frank Coghlan Jr.|George Daly|Frankie Darro|Snitz Edwards|Rita Flynn|Dorothy Gee|Douglas Gerrard|Dorothy Gray|Ben Hendricks Jr.|Robert Homans|Eddie Kane|Arnold Lucy|Mia Marvin|Sam McDaniel|Harold Minjir|Helen Parrish|Lee Phelps|Russ Powell|Purnell Pratt|Nanci Price|Joe Sawyer|Landers Stevens|William H. Strauss|Charles Sullivan|Lucille Ward|Adele Watson
